Module trustedlist
Package trustedlist.models.engine

Class Selection

java.lang.Object
trustedlist.models.engine.Selection
public final class Selection extends Object
Class used to handle and keep track of user selections to allow navigation and search

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Provider>
    getProvidersList()
    Create a provider list based on current selection To work properly, you should handle the selection of countries before using this method.
    If that filter is not set, it throws an error
    List<Country>
    getSelectedCountries()
    Get a list of the current selection selected countries
    List<Provider>
    getSelectedProviders()
    Get a list of the current selection selected providers

    Get a list of the current selection selected status
    List<Type>
    getSelectedTypes()
    Get a list of the current selection selected types
    List<Status>
    getStatusList()
    Create a status list based on current selection
    To work properly, you should handle the selection of countries, providers and types
    before using this method.
    If one of those filter is not set, it throws an error
    List<Type>
    getTypesList()
    Create a types list based on current selection
    To work properly, you should handle the selection of countries and providers
    before using this method.
    If one of those filter is not set, it throws an error

    • getProvidersList

      public List<Provider> getProvidersList()
      Create a provider list based on current selection To work properly, you should handle the selection of countries before using this method.
      If that filter is not set, it throws an error
      Returns:
      List of providers base on current selection made
      Throws:
      NoSelectionException - If a needed selection is not been made

    • getTypesList

      public List<Type> getTypesList()
      Create a types list based on current selection
      To work properly, you should handle the selection of countries and providers
      before using this method.
      If one of those filter is not set, it throws an error
      Returns:
      List of types base on current selection made
      Throws:
      NoSelectionException - If a needed selection is not been made

    • getStatusList

      public List<Status> getStatusList()
      Create a status list based on current selection
      To work properly, you should handle the selection of countries, providers and types
      before using this method.
      If one of those filter is not set, it throws an error
      Returns:
      List of status base on current selection made
      Throws:
      NoSelectionException - If a needed selection is not been made
